WHY_ME_TEXT: I develop software with the goal of turning ideas into functional and sustainable solutions. For me, technology is not just a tool but a structured process: analyze, plan, implement, improve. I am driven by transforming complex requirements into clear and maintainable systems.
WHY_ME_LOCATED_TEXT: I live in Schneverdingen in the Lüneburg Heath and work flexibly in a remote or hybrid model. Regular presence in the regional environment is just as natural for me as occasional on-site assignments at more distant locations.
WHY_ME_REMOTE_TEXT: I work in a structured way in a remote environment while also valuing direct team interaction. Open communication, transparent processes, and mutual feedback are crucial for me to collaboratively develop high-quality and sustainable software solutions – both on-site and digitally.
WHY_ME_VIEW_TEXT: I analyze complex problems systematically and break them down into clearly defined steps. Attention to detail and strong technical understanding enable me to identify root causes precisely and develop stable, well-designed solutions. I developed this analytical mindset during my previous work as a civil engineer – today, I apply it directly to software development.
WHY_ME_IDEA_TEXT: I approach projects with structure and a holistic perspective from the very beginning. Clear planning, clean architecture, and transparent processes form the foundation of sustainable software development for me. This results in solutions that not only work reliably but remain maintainable and scalable in the long term.
CAREER_ENTRY_1_POINT_1: Contributing to the web application meinegemeinde.digital
CAREER_ENTRY_1_POINT_2: Implementation of production-ready Angular & Ionic features
CAREER_ENTRY_1_POINT_3: Independent feature integration within an existing codebase
CAREER_ENTRY_2_POINT_1: Independent planning and organization of lessons
CAREER_ENTRY_2_POINT_2: Individual mentoring and structured knowledge transfer
CAREER_ENTRY_3_POINT_1: Planning and coordination of complex construction projects
CAREER_ENTRY_3_POINT_2: Analytical problem-solving and structured project execution
CAREER_ENTRY_3_POINT_3: Development of technically and economically sound solutions
MY_SKILL_SET_TEXT: Technology excites me not because of its novelty, but because of its potential. I approach new concepts in a structured way and apply them deliberately to build stable and well-designed solutions. Learning for me is a continuous process — not out of obligation, but conviction.
MY_SKILL_SET_HOVER: Do you have an idea? Tell me which technology you have in mind.
MY_WORK_EXPERIENCE_TEXT_1: As part of my role at vernetzwerk, I develop frontend features for the app meinegemeinde.digital.
MY_WORK_EXPERIENCE_TEXT_2: I am currently designing and implementing an image editing tool with rotation and precise cropping functionality. My work includes UI logic, state management, and seamless integration into the existing Angular architecture with a strong focus on performance and maintainability.
CONTACT_ME_TEXT_2: I look forward to hearing from you and collaborating on future projects.
